title: JESUS, our Lord, make no delay

verses.text:
JESUS, our Lord, make no delay
To bless us with thy face;
Drive interposing clouds away,
And make our darkness chase.

What do we here without thy grace,
O blessed Lamb of God?
'T will be a dark and tiresome place
Unless we feel thy word.

Come in with power to every soul,
O thou immortal Dove;
Make every wounded spirit whole
With thy redeeming love.

We long to meet our God to-day,
And feast on his grace divine;
That every soul with joy may say,
'My Lord, my God, I'm thine.'
